Springfield.WDBR:
WDBR is a Top 40/CHR radio station licensed to and serving the Springfield, Illinois market.


== History ==
103.7 FM was Springfield's second FM station and the oldest continuously operating FM station in the market. The station originally played beautiful music as WTAX-FM. In January 1972 WTAX-FM became WDBR and switched to Drake-Chenault's "Solid Gold" format, a mix of adult-appeal Top 40 hits and rock oldies.
